rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0001
rows.name:
It was thirty years ago from now
that Elma-san visited Earth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Sensing that a war between a mighty federation of star cluster nations
possessing the Growth and an alien civilization of comparable scale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Would reach the Earth sphere,
Elma-san, in order to save us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0005
rows.name: Descended to Earth all by herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Gaining the cooperation of supporters,
starting with Secretary of Defense Nagi...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Elma-san advanced the plan
for Earth's humanity to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0008
rows.name: The Dolls to counter alien weapons...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0009
rows.name: The immigrant ships capable of sailing faster than the speed of light...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0010
rows.name: And the technology regarding [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby] and the Life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0011
rows.name:
All of that was alien civilization technology
brought by Elma-san.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0012
rows.name: Everyone says that Earth vanished back then, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0013
rows.name: I do not think that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0014
rows.name:
As for immigrant ships, it's not just our White Whale.
There must be other ships that survived too[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0016
rows.name: We will go on living on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Though there will likely be various difficulties ahead,
we will not give up...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12170100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Believing that the day will come
when we can go search for Earth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]
